Energy_Shield.display_help: The power radiating from this item cloaks the associated defense in a shield of energy, increasing its defense.
Energy_Shield.display_short_help: Adds a protective force field around the turret.

Analyzer.display_help: The all-seeing power of this defense penetrates the mind of the target, revealing their weaknesses and fears. The target's Defense and Resistances are lowered for a short time.
Analyzer.display_target_help: Your Defense and Resistances have been analyzed, making the base defenses more effective against you.

Snow_Crystal.display_help: This opens a chilling blast from the elemental realms, capable of causing damage and holding the target for a short period of time.
Snow_Crystal.display_target_help: You are frozen in a Block of Ice.

Concealed_Turret.display_help: This artifact fires not stones but capsules of pure force that can lethally strike down a target.

Dampening_Ray.display_help: The Eye of Age inflicts on the target the curse of age. Muscles weaken and tire. Damage caused by the target is reduced until the effect wears off.
Dampening_Ray.display_target_help: You feel weakened by the Dampeners attack.

Energy_Beam.display_help: This crystal requires a powerful energy spell to shape raw energy into a potent blast. Only the most powerful of the arcane can master this.

Igniter.display_help: This artifact fires not stones but capsules of pure force that can lethally strike down a target.
Igniter.display_target_help: You are on fire and taking damage.

Chain_Gun.display_help: This artifact fires not stones but capsules of pure force that can lethally strike down a target.
Chain_Gun.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the Chain Gun.

Sapper.display_help: The Eye of Despair saps the will of enemies, sucking ambition and drive from their very souls. Each hit drains Endurance from the target.

Trapdoor_Turret.display_help: This artifact fires not stones but capsules of pure force that can lethally strike down a target.

Analyzer.display_help: The all-seeing power of this defense penetrates the mind of the target, revealing their weaknesses and fears. The target's Defense and Resistances are lowered for a short time.
Analyzer.display_target_help: Your Defense and Resistances have been analyzed, making the base defenses more effective against you.

Snow_Crystal.display_help: This opens a chilling blast from the elemental realms, capable of causing damage and holding the target for a short period of time.
Snow_Crystal.display_target_help: You are frozen in a Block of Ice.

Concealed_Turret.display_help: The beam from this crystal weakens enemies, reducing the damage they can cause for a short duration.

Dampening_Ray.display_help: The beam from this crystal weakens enemies, reducing the damage they can cause for a short duration.
Dampening_Ray.display_target_help: You feel weakened by the Dampeners attack.

Energy_Beam.display_help: Raw energy is one of the easiest of all powers to manipulate, making these pylons a standard defense item.

Igniter.display_help: This crystal taps into the fires of other realms to cause minor damage over time to targets in range.
Igniter.display_target_help: You are on fire and taking damage.

Chain_Gun.display_help: Spells bound to this apport stone balls at high speeds, causing lethal damage to the target.
Chain_Gun.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the Chain Gun.

Sapper.display_help: This beam taps a dark realm that sucks the very spirit from enemies, draining Endurance with each hit.

Trapdoor_Turret.display_help: The beam from this crystal weakens enemies, reducing the damage they can cause for a short duration.

Analyzer.display_target_help: Your Defense and Resistances have been analyzed, making the base defenses more effective against you.

Improved_Snow_Crystal.display_target_help: You are frozen in a Block of Ice.

Dampening_Ray.display_help: The beam from this crystal weakens enemies, reducing the damage they can cause for a short duration.
Dampening_Ray.display_target_help: You feel weakened by the Dampeners attack.

Energy_Beam.display_help: Raw energy is one of the easiest of all powers to manipulate and stronger spells can be used to make it more powerful in battle.

Igniter.display_help: This crystal taps into the fires of other realms to cause moderate damage over time to targets in range.
Igniter.display_target_help: You are on fire and taking damage.

Chain_Gun.display_help: The beam from this crystal weakens enemies, reducing the damage they can cause for a short duration.
Chain_Gun.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the Chain Gun.

Sapper.display_help: This beam taps a dark realm that sucks the very spirit from enemies, draining Endurance with each hit.

Trapdoor_Turret.display_help: The beam from this crystal weakens enemies, reducing the damage they can cause for a short duration.

Rikti_Plasma_Turret.display_help: Developed at a military skunk works, the RPT was built from captured Rikti technology. Only a few prototypes of the RPT are said to exist, so it is quite an honor for your base to be assigned one.
Rikti_Plasma_Turret.display_target_help: Plasma burns are hard to heal. The burns have halted your Regeneration rate.

Scorpions_Surprise.display_help: Based on the latest in research from Black Scorpions labs, the X-8 Missile Launcher, better known as the Scorpion's Surprise, is one of the heaviest pieces of base defense ordnance available today. It combines heavy damage and stunning blasts into a surprise package that can rise from any floor surface.

Energy_Shield.display_help: This auxiliary item covers the linked defense item in a protective force field.
Energy_Shield.display_short_help: Adds a protective force field around the turret.

Analyzer.display_help: The Strategic Analyzer provides improved performance in the realtime assessments of potential threats. Targets scanned have their Defense and Resistances debuffed as weaknesses are analyzed.
Analyzer.display_target_help: Your Defense and Resistances have been analyzed, making the base defenses more effective against you.

Elite_Chill_Cannon.display_help: The Elite Cryo Cannon fires a blast of supercoolant capable of affecting even the most fiery super. In addition to causing damage, the cannon can freeze the target in place for a short period of time.
Elite_Chill_Cannon.display_target_help: You are frozen in a Block of Ice.

Concealed_Turret.display_help: This turret is designed to provide the best in frontline defense. Mounted flush into the wall, it will automatically detect foe, emerge and fire. It is useful for defense in public locations where more obtrusive counter-measures might cause unwanted notice and for engineering ambush situations to deal with intruders.It has moderate lethal damage and recycle rate to provide support for your security teams.

Dampening_Ray.display_help: The Dampener Mk III is the top-of-the-line in base defense,. It fires a concentrated blast of energy capable of doing moderate damage to mid-rank foes.
Dampening_Ray.display_target_help: You feel weakened by the Dampeners attack.

Energy_Beam.display_help: The Energy Beam Mk III is the top-of-the-line in base defense,. It fires a concentrated blast of energy capable of doing moderate damage to mid-rank foes.

Igniter.display_help: The Elite Igniter upgrades your alternatives to standard lethal or energy attacks, diversifying your base defenses. It sprays fire at a single target, causing moderate damage over time.
Igniter.display_target_help: You are on fire and taking damage.

Chain_Gun.display_help: This is the deluxe automated sentry turret, standard to military bases worldwide. It can automatically detect and fire heavy machinegun bursts at infiltrators.
Chain_Gun.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the Chain Gun.

Sapper.display_help: The Sapper III provides target offense reduction capability for perimeter defense. Using a focused electrical charge, a each shot drains Endurance from the target rendering foes powerless to activate attacks or defenses.

Trapdoor_Turret.display_help: This concealed turret delivers a powerful punch, unleashing a blast of energy that can do heavy damage to a target. The force of the wave has the potential send enemies flying, making this ideal for holding foes at bay.

Analyzer.display_help: This is a military-issue automated light sentry turret. It can automatically detect and fire short bursts at infiltrators, making it ideal for installation defense.
Analyzer.display_target_help: Your Defense and Resistances have been analyzed, making the base defenses more effective against you.

Chill_Cannon.display_help: The Cryo Cannon fires a blast of super coolant capable of affecting even the most fiery super. In addition to causing light damage, the cannon can freeze the target in place for a short period of time.
Chill_Cannon.display_target_help: You are frozen in a Block of Ice.

Concealed_Turret.display_help: This turret is designed to provide a low profile frontline defense. Mounted flush into the wall, it automatically pops up to attack detected foes. It causes minor lethal damage to supplement reaction by defenders.

Dampening_Ray.display_help: The Dampener Mk I is the inexpensive solution to base defense, readily available to all. It fires a concentrated blast of energy capable of doing moderate damage to low-rank foes.
Dampening_Ray.display_target_help: You feel weakened by the Dampeners attack.

Energy_Beam.display_help: The Energy Beam Mk I is the inexpensive solution to base defense, readily available to all. It fires a concentrated blast of energy capable of doing moderate damage to low-rank foes.

Igniter.display_help: The Igniter provides an alternative to standard lethal or energy attacks, diversifying your base defenses. It sprays fire at a single target, causing minor damage over time.
Igniter.display_target_help: You are on fire and taking damage.

Chain_Gun.display_help: This is a military-issue automated light sentry turret. It can automatically detect and fire short bursts at infiltrators, making it ideal for installation defense.
Chain_Gun.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the Chain Gun.

Sapper.display_help: The Sapper cannon provides the finest in target incapacitation for perimeter defense. Using a focused electrical charge, a single shot drains Endurance from the target. Repeated hits can render even the most powerful foes powerless, unable to activate attacks or defenses.

Trapdoor_Turret.display_help: This concealed turret delivers a powerful punch, unleashing a blast of energy that can do heavy damage to a target. The force of the wave has the potential send enemies flying, making this ideal for holding foes at bay.

Igniter.display_target_help: You are on fire and taking damage.

Chain_Gun.display_help: This is an automated sentry turret, standard to military bases worldwide. It can automatically detect and fire bursts at infiltrators that cause moderate damage.
Chain_Gun.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the Chain Gun.

Sapper.display_help: The Sapper II provides target incapacitation for perimeter defense. Using a focused electrical charge, a each shot drains Endurance from the target, rendering foes powerless, unable to activate attacks or defenses.

Trapdoor_Turret.display_help: This concealed turret delivers a powerful punch, unleashing a blast of energy that can do heavy damage to a target. The force of the wave has the potential send enemies flying, making this ideal for holding foes at bay.

Explode.display_help: When Turrets are destroyed, they tend to explode, but deal no damage.
